config.not-riding-alert.title: Not Riding Alert
config.not-riding-alert.enabled.tooltip: Make an alert sound if the player is not riding any ride
config.not-riding-alert.soundId.tooltip: The sound ID to play when alerting (e.g., entity.experience_orb.pickup)
Dim the screen when riding to reduce distractions
config.not-riding-alert.defocusCursor.to: Automatically release the mouse cursor when riding or when ready to ride
config.not-riding-alert.autograb.tooltip: Automatically detect ride regions and release the cursor when ready to ride
config.not-riding-alert.rideDisplayCount: Number of rides to show in the tracker (1-60)
config.not-riding-alert.rideDisplay.tool: Toggle whether this ride appears in the tracker
config.not-riding-alert.minRideTimeMinut: Do not display rides lower than this ride time in the tracker (0 = no filter)
config.not-riding-alert.hideScoreboard.t: Hide the scoreboard while still tracking ride data
config.not-riding-alert.hideChat.tooltip: Hide the chat for a cleaner interface
config.not-riding-alert.hideHealth.toolt: Hide the health bar for a cleaner interface
config.not-riding-alert.onlyAutograbbing: Only show rides that have auto-grabbing support in the tracker
